dcterms:description: The CNN/DailyMail dataset contains news articles and corresponding human-written news highlights as summaries. It is widely adopted for extractive summarization tasks.
dcterms:title: CNN/DailyMail

dcterms:creator: Shashi Narayan
Shay B Cohen
Mirella Lapata
dcterms:description: XSum is a one-sentence news summarization dataset where all summaries are professionally written by the original authors of the documents.
dcterms:title: XSum

dcterms:creator: Arman Cohan
Franck Dernoncourt
Doo Soon Kim
Trung Bui
Seokhwan Kim
Walter Chang
Nazli Goharian
dcterms:description: The PubMed dataset is a scientific paper summarization dataset that focuses on long documents, using the introduction section as the article and the abstract section as the summary.
dcterms:title: PubMed
